long_description: If you're looking for a way to save luggage space, Eagle Creek has the answer; Pack-It(R) Compressor reduces volume of stored items by up to 80%. Patented one-way pressure valve and top zipper closure make packing and compressing items a breeze. Made from nylon-reinforced polyethylene for durability.
short_description: If you're looking for a way to save luggage space, Eagle Creek has the answer; Pack-It(R) Compressor reduces volume of stored items by up to 80%.
